changes.change: Fixed crashes and prettier prefs. But yall please choose exactly 5 or 7 apps to avoid any issues
Nicer prefs. Changed LastApp to be in the middle of the view and fixed duplicates appearing. Keyboard disables the gesture
Added option for keyboard disables. Fixed view getting stuck onscreen and not dimissing
Added the ability to choose between a black and white background. Added the ability to control background color based on noctis state.
